dialogue.chunk: You do not have the map of this area!
We are automata. If you talk to us, we will repeat the same sentences over and over again.
However, some of us have gained... say, additional abilities, over time.
When they gained more knowledge they learned to build actual robots.
However, those robots went mad once the disease hit them. They are like zombies now.
You look just like them, but how come you are not mad?
To destroy a god one needs a blood gem.
That's what they say, but I find it hard to believe.
They say The Shopkeeper is immortal.
You cannot die if you have never been alive in the first place...
If you had all the BLOOD SHARDS, you could craft a BLOOD GEM here.
You have activated the time portals.
Destroy the world and create a new one?
You can use BLOOD GEM to enter this portal.
Press X to shoot something green. Laser? Plasma? Who cares!
Press DOWN + Z to slide like a pro!
It lets you stay underwater without dying.
Hold Z while on air to to use it.
It can take you to new heights! Literally.
Hold X after shooting to charge a... charge shot.
Release X to shoot it. It can break walls you couldn't break before!
Despite being rusty, it can still open locks. Maybe.
Press R.Shift to open the map. Does not work in the past.
You obtain a pair of "RUNNING BOOTS"!
Now you can run and climb faster.
It protects you from powerful attacks.
For some reason it makes your bullets more powerful.
Press R.Shift to open the map. Does not work in the present.
Do you want to save your progress?
